ing: 6 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles caffeinated lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "Adult punch spiked with gin.  Use the ice cream to make it a holiday punch or use crushed ice to make it a cool drink on hot summer days. Leave out the gin, and it is a good drink for kids at a birthday party because the ice cream cools the punch."
ins: In a large punch bowl combine orange juice and gin. Gently stir in the carbonated soda and slide in the ice cream.
